title: Numero Uno Aces India's Love for Denim - Indian Retailer
summary: The article discusses the growth and plans of various beauty and personal care brands in India for the year 2023, highlighting milestones, expansion strategies, and focuses on sustainable and ethical practices.
green_innovation: FALSE. The article does not focus on innovations aimed at environmental sustainability or reducing negative environmental externalities.
business_innovation: TRUE. The article discusses new product launches, store expansions, revenue growth strategies, and market positioning, aligning with the definition of business innovation.
